code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Logout=()=>{const handleLogout=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('/logout');if(response.status===200){window.location.href='/login';}else{alert('Logout failed');}}catch(error){console.error('Error during logout:',error);alert('Logout failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"});};export default Logout;
